name: captcha-for-elementor-pro-forms
description: Adds hCaptcha and Cloudflare Turnstile support to Elementor Pro forms
author: Dave Podosyan

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm run create-zip
scripts.copy-files: npm run create-dirs && npm run copy-plugin-files && npm run create-languages-dir
scripts.copy-plugin-files: cp captcha-for-elementor-pro-forms.php readme.txt uninstall.php dist/captcha-for-elementor-pro-forms/ && cp -r assets includes dist/captcha-for-elementor-pro-forms/
scripts.dev: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:format
scripts.prerelease: npm run version-sync && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.release: npm run prerelease && echo 'Release ZIP created in releases/ directory'
